sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger➛Testing Record➛Name

We are happy to share that your covid test results are Negative. Although the pandemic is still around the corner so, we would recommend you follow all the required precautions and stay safe.

 

You can access our CowiCare application for any healthcare requirements.

Thank you for using CowiCare!

 

Stay Safe, Stay Healthy

With Regards

Team CowiCare

Dear  Trigger➛Testing Record➛Name  

Your request has been submitted. 
Please note that your record number is Trigger➛Testing Record➛Number
Thank you for using CowiCare!

 

Stay Safe, Stay Healthy

With Regards

Team CowiCare

Dear Trigger➛Testing Record➛Name

We are sorry to inform you that your covid test result is Positive. We know that these times are tough due to the pandemic but we assure you that the good times are near. Your Mental Health is a Priority, Your Happiness is fundamental and Your Self-care is vital. So stay strong and take care. We would recommend you to follow our CowiCare Help Guide.

 

You can access our CowiCare application for all the covid healthcare requirements.

Thank you for using CowiCare!

 

Stay Safe, Stay Healthy

With Regards

Team CowiCare
